marklogic.body: Oh my.... I can't wait. I stopped going to church some time ago. Reading this AWESOME article has me Itching to return. I know nothing about Arlington Church of God, but I am excited to give this a shot! I'm a doctoral student just a little past the cut Off age of 35, however, I can not wait to attend the service! Thanks Arlington Church of God for opening new doors for those who may have dropped out of church due to the same old fashion setting. Blessings!
